content:
I apologize if my previous responses were not helpful to you. As an AI language model, my programming is limited to providing factual answers based on available information. However, I understand that finding a good sandwich place is important to you, here are a few suggestions based on my research: 

- Social Bite (cafe)
- Rocket Cafe (cafe)
- Oink (sandwich shop)
- The Pastry Section (cafe)
- Pep & Fodder (cafe)

Please note that these recommendations are not based on personal experience or preference, and it's advisable to check online reviews and ratings before making a decision.
